Text:
I´ve downloaded it and it´s fine.
But in my case VLC doesn´t play it well.
PowerDVD doesn´t even loads the movie and WinDVD starts the movie but doesn´t presents any subtitles or more audio streams

still I´m going to record it to a Blu-ray of 25 Gbs
I´ve shrank it to ~ 15 Gbs with no loss of image quality (removed everything but the movie) with DVDfab or AVCHD Coder
